abstract: A case of lung adenocarcinoma in a 20-year-old woman with bronchiectasis is presented. The patient showed no clinical and radiological findings in regard to the carcinoma. The tumor was discovered incidentally in the parenchyma of the lung specimen resected due to chronic bronchiectasis.
title: Incidental lung adenocarcinoma in a 20-year-old woman with bronchiectasis.
